sentences.en: Alice's record of perfect attendance is very creditable to her.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯从不缺席的记录真是值得称赞的.

sentences.en: Attendance at Professor Smith's lecture fell off sharply that evening.
sentences.cn: 那晚去听史密斯教授讲演的人显著减少了.

sentences.en: Attendance at the meeting is compulsory.
Attendance at these lectures is not compulsory.
sentences.cn: 这些课不是硬性规定要听的。

sentences.en: Attendance on the course is purely voluntary.
sentences.cn: 听这门课纯粹是自愿的。

sentences.en: Average weekly cinema attendance in February was 2.41 million.
sentences.cn: 2月份，平均每周的观影人数为241万。

sentences.en: He would have a nurse in constant attendance day and night.
sentences.cn: 会有一位护士日夜不间断地陪护着他。
他的出勤记录时好时差。

sentences.en: It was a record attendance for a midweek game.
sentences.cn: 对于一场周中期举行的比赛,有这么多人到场还是首次.

sentences.en: Last year’s fair saw attendance figures of 32,000.
sentences.cn: 去年的交易会有3.2万人参加。

sentences.en: Police with riot gear and several fire engines are in attendance.
sentences.cn: 防暴警察和数辆消防车都到了。

sentences.en: Some estimates put the attendance at 60,000.
sentences.cn: 一些预测认为将有6万人参加。

sentences.en: The attendance of this class never dropped off.
sentences.cn: 这个班的出席人数从未下降.

sentences.en: The doctor will have a record of her attendances.
sentences.cn: 医生会记录她的出诊次数。

sentences.en: The young man danced attendance on his rich aunt.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人小心侍候他有钱的姑妈.

sentences.en: We have an average attendance of 4,000 fans per game.
sentences.cn: 每场比赛平均有4,000名球迷来观战。
